DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male 2 . Age 30 65 year age ( inclusive ) 3 . Body mass index 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 4 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study 5 . Must provide write informed consent 6 . A history regular bowel movement 7 . Must agree use adequate method contraception Key 1 . Participation clinical research study within previous 3 month 2 . Current history drug alcohol abuse past 2 year positive drug abuse screen 3 . Current smoker 4 . Radiation exposure , include present study , exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year 5 . Clinically significant medical history , current medical psychiatric condition , ECG finding , laboratory/urinalysis abnormality 6 . Activated partial thromboplastin time PT outside normal laboratory limit
